duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the assessment, planning, and implementation of psychosocial services for patients.
Improve access to behavioral health services while addressing obesity, social determinants of health, and health equity.
Provide mental health screening and complete DSM V diagnosis of behavioral health disorders.
Establish rapport quickly and in a patient-centered manner.
Communicate effectively in written and verbal form to document assessments, treatment plans, and patient progress.
Collaborate and communicate professionally across multidisciplinary care team while modeling Trauma Informed and Patient Centric framework.
Flexibility to adapt to changes in medical and behavioral health protocols and policy.
Assess and effectively support patients struggling with eating disorders and other mental health concerns.
Fidelity to behavioral and ethical standards of conduct as it relates to professional mental health licensure in a medical setting.
Contribute professionally as part of a team.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in Social Work, Counseling, Psychology, or related human service field
